titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Salvadoran subject collection, 1976-1994
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Processed by:

did.head: Descriptive Summary

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 4 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 1 videotape cassette

did.abstract: Reports, serial issues, pamphlets, flyers, press releases, other printed matter, and video tape, relating to political conditions, guerrilla warfare, and civil rights in El Salvador.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Salvadoran subject collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.p: Reports, program statements, transcripts, press releases, flyers, printed material, map and miscellany

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: *See card catalog for increments that may have been received since December 1994

did.unittitle: General. Reports, serial issues, letter, pamphlet, clippings, flyers, circulars, and bulletins, 1976-1990. Includes material relating to the Fuerzas Armadas de la Resistencia Nacional, Partido Comunista de El Salvador, Ejercito Revolucionario de Pueblo, Frente Democratico Revolucionario, and Salvadoran refugees in Mexico and Costa Rica. SEE ALSO: OVERSIZE FILE
Frente de Accion Popular Unificada (FAPU). Serial issues, political platform, and a flyer, 1980

Frente Faribundo Marti para la Liberacion Nacional (FMLN). Reports, flyers, serial issues, program statements, circulars, radio broadcast transcripts, pamphlets, and press releases, 1980-1990. Includes statements by former guerrilla leaders, distributed by United States embassy, 1987, and map of guerrilla activity prepared by Central Intelligence Agency, 1991. SEE ALSO: AUDIOVISUAL FILE
Human rights. Reports, letters, position paper, and a pamphlet, ca. 1983-1990
Partido Comunista de El Salvador. Reports relating to the Seventh Party Congress, 1979
Peace negotiations. Official texts of agreements, 1989-1991, and pamphlet describing peace process, 1993

United States. Speech by Nestor D. Sanchez, Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Inter-American Affairs, concerning United States military assistance and operations of Salvadoran armed forces, 1983
Videocassette recording entitled Tiempo de Victoria, produced by Radio Venceremos, 1987
